com.cloudcraftgaming.perworldchatplus.utils

Class MessageManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudcraftgaming.perworldchatplus.utils.MessageManager

  • public class MessageManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Nova Fox on 1/30/2016. Website: www.cloudcraftgaming.com For Project: PerWorldChatPlus This class handles message related functions, such as creating the message files and retrieving messages.

        public static java.lang.String getPrefix()

        Gets the no permission message.
        Returns:

        Returns:

        Returns:
